t: Ancient Amazonians intentionally created fertile “dark earth” | MIT News | Massachusetts Institute of Technology
s: A new study suggests patches of fertile soil in the Amazon, known as dark earth, were intentionally produced by ancient Amazonians as a way to improve the soil and sustain large and complex societies.
